item.title: Hi üëã, I'm Ynki!
item.description:
What deliver üîß

Software & systems: core platforms, high-performance services.
Driver development: Windows/Linux kernel and device drivers, tooling.
Web engineering: lean backends, stable APIs, admin tooling, integrations.
Mobile: native iOS/Android or cross-platform only when it fits.

How work üß≠

Direct collaboration: one call to the engineers doing the work.
Short iterations: clear milestones, demos, measurable outcomes.
Plain architecture: auditable designs, reproducible builds, no bloat.
Quality by default: tests, reviews, observability.

Pricing and engagement üí∂

Cost-efficient (yes, cheap) rates with transparent estimates.
Fixed-bid or time-and-materials. Your choice.
No lock-in. You own the code and the keys.

Capabilities & stack ‚öôÔ∏è

Languages: C, C++, C#, React, Python, TypeScript/Node.js, Go, Java, Kotlin, Bash
Drivers: Windows WDK, KMDF/UMDF
Web & services: .NET, Node (Express/Fastify), gRPC/REST, WebSockets, PHP
Data & queues: PostgreSQL, Redis, SQLite

To start a conversation, open an issue or reach out via the org profile. üì©
